title: Chairman of ITN tenders resignation
body_lines: The chairman of Independent Television Network (ITN), Niroshan Premaratne has tendered his resignation.
The former parliamentarian was appointed to the post on the 3rd of January this year.
A former TV presenter with the state-owned ITN, Mr. Premaratne had contested and won the 2015 parliamentary election from the Matara District. However, he was not re-elected in 2020.
